text: The Women's Super League Grand Final is the championship-deciding game of rugby league's RFL Women's Super League competition. ==History== After the formation of the Women's Super League in 2017 it was announced that the title would be decided by a playoff series and Grand Final as the men's competition does as well. The first two Grand Finals were held at the Manchester Regional Arena on the same day and before the men's Grand Final. For 2019 it was announced Headingley Stadium would host the final. ==Finals== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=3%|Year !width=5%|Winners !width=1%|Score !width=5%|Runner-up !width=5%|Venue !width=2%|Attendance |- !align:center|2017 | Bradford Bulls |36-6 | Featherstone Rovers |rowspan=2|Manchester Regional Arena | |- !align:center|2018 | Wigan Warriors |16-18 | Leeds Rhinos | 1,189 |- !align:center|2019 | | - | |Headingley | |} ==See also== *NRL Grand Final *NRL Women's Grand Final ==References== Grand Category:2017 establishments in England Category:Rugby league club matches Category:Grand finals
title: RFL Women's Super League Grand Final
